description: JSON Schema for contractor_license class in Elephant Lexicon

company_name.description: Company name associated with the license, if applicable.

dbpr_lookup_url.description: Direct lookup URL in the Florida DBPR system.

expiration_date.description: Date the license is set to expire.

holder_name.description: Individual or business name holding the license.

issue_date.description: Date the license was originally issued.

last_verified_at.description: Timestamp when this license was last verified against DBPR records.

license_number.description: Full license string including prefix and number, e.g., CGC1526178.

license_type.description: Type of contractor license, inferred from the prefix.

notes.description: Any additional notes about this license.

number.description: Numeric portion of the license number.

prefix.description: Prefix portion of the Florida DBPR license number.

status.description: Current DBPR status of the license.

title: contractor_license
